org.jetel.data

Class CompressedByteDataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataField
      • org.jetel.data.DataFieldImpl
        • org.jetel.data.ByteDataField
          • org.jetel.data.CompressedByteDataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class CompressedByteDataField
extends ByteDataField
    Class implementing field which represents gzip-compressed array of bytes.
    Since:
    12/01/06
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public byte[] getValueDuplicate()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Returns the duplicate of the internal value of the data field. If field's value is deemed to be NULL (isNull() return true) then the returned value is NULL. Otherwise the duplicate of the internal value is converted to appropriate object representation and returned.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Checks whether two DataField objects are equal. Both fiels should be of the same type. If they are not, ClassCastException is thrown.
        Two datafields where each is flagged as to be NULL (isNull() returns true) are deemed NOT equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class ByteDataField
